fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Cray currently is mainly following the EC's HPC activities under the H2020 and previous framework programmes.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Cray is a full member of the European Technology Platform ETP4HPC (http://www.etp4hpc.eu) 
 
Cray is a member of the Chambre de Commerce et d'Industrie France-Amérique (http://www.ccifa.com) 
 
Cray is a member of TeraTec (http://www.teratec.eu/)
goals__remit:
Cray is a global leader in supercomputing and provides highly advanced systems and solutions and world-class service and support to government, industry and academia.  
 
Leveraging 40 years of experience in developing the world’s most advanced supercomputers, Cray offers a comprehensive portfolio of high performance computing systems as well as storage and data analytics solutions delivering sustained performance, scalability and reliability on a wide range of applications. Additionally, Cray’s technologies are available in configurations to meet customers’ varying budgets and needs. 
 
The European organisation covers the full spectrum of enterprise activities: Sales & Marketing, Technical Presales, Customer Service, Application Support & Benchmarking, Product R&D, the Cray EMEA Research Lab, and G&A functions.
relevant_communication:
Cray is active in the FP7 project EPiGRAM 
Cray was active in the FP7 project CRESTA 
Cray supports various H2020 HPC Centres of Excellence like ESIWACE, EoCoE, and POP. 
 
Cray is a full member of the European Technology Platform ETP4HPC. 
 
Cray is an active member in H2020 projects EXPERTISE, Plan4RES, MAESTRO and EPIGRAM-HS.
